name: World of Warships: Legends—the Mighty Mutsu
name_original: World of Warships: Legends—the Mighty Mutsu
description:
Obliterate the competition with the mighty Mutsu! Her immense 410 mm guns are unrivalled at Tier V in terms of their pure power. Mutsu also carries a couple of torpedoes to surprise any enemies that dare get too close.

This bundle includes: - Tier V Mutsu - 7 days of Premium Account - 10x Type 1 camos - 37,000 Commander XP! - Bonus: 10x rare ship boosters

If you already have Mutsu, you'll receive compensation in the form of 10,000 doubloons. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc. is only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
